item.title: Rosie Pattern Matching Language (RPL)
item.description: Thoughts It will be useful in parsing s-expressions. RPL compiled, block-structured, lexically scoped, declarative pattern expression language with a module system. Names are bound to values of type: pattern, macro, function, and environment (module) Only patterns are first-class. Block structure There are lexical units (imaginatively called “blocks”) of code that we can talk about.
